articles.title: Joan Didion, ‘New Journalist’ Who Explored Culture and Chaos, Dies at 87 - The New York Times
articles.description: She established a distinctive voice in American fiction before turning to political reporting and screenplay writing. But it was California, her native state, that provided her with her richest material.
articles.content: With their third screenplay, Ms. Didion and her husband struck gold. With James Taylor and Carly Simon in mind for the lead roles, they rewrote A Star Is Born to bring it into the rock n roll era. Wi… [+1554 chars]
